Basement

Cathedral
For your information:\nAll tools moved to new workshop.
Only blueprints and interior in this room.
Key is safely stored in the deep.
Please respect the space of every growing being. Nature will protect itself.
Do not cut what is not in your way. Do not kill what need not die.
Grow into the better you.
Fren's treehouse.
The wood in this area is unique. Sturdy and pale.\nI will bring some to the new place.
I used it for the bed. I can make a blueprint, so do not take it.
It was really hard to get up here.
Did you just come in?
I thought applications were closed...\nNo matter. Welcome to the farm!
I understand that everything here is new for you, so consider me your supervisor.
Now for your first task...
Take this seed, plant it, and come back to me with the crop.
I gave you a seed. Plant it, and wait for it to grow.
Bring me the crop once it has fully grown.
Excellent!\nLooks like you will be good at this in no time.
We've been storing seeds down in the basement.
Here is the key.\nLet's see you grow a few more crops.
Oh also, I shouldn't have to say this but, uh...\nLet the wild life be, alright?
We've been storing seeds down in the basement.
Go collect some, and grow a few more crops.
Don't get lost down there.
Great work!
This farm is in a bit of disarray.\nTake those planks and make another plant box for yourself.
With this kind of progress you're shaping up to be employee of the month!
If only... that title existed anymore.
Unfortunately things have changed a bit, as you saw down there. It's a bit of a mess.
But messes are only here until someone cleans them up.\nSo let's get to work!
I'm sure you've noticed. Nature here is slightly... bigger.
Plants grow at explosive rates, and wildlife adapts in turn.
There's a forest near here, the basement connects to it. Only it's been some time since anyone's been through there.
If we could gain entrance then the mines won't be far, and the...\nWe'd have all the materials we need!
We'll need a tool to cut our way through. Try and look for something, like a workshop, down there.
You'll need a tool to cut your way into the forest.
Look for a workshop down there. Maybe they left some things behind.
